intro: Angostura larensis, commonly known as the Larense Angostura, is a species of flowering plant native to the Andean region of South America. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its small, fragrant flowers and woody stems, often growing in moist, shaded environments. It is sometimes cultivated for its ornamental value due to its attractive foliage and blooms. However, it is not widely known or studied compared to other members of its family.
